docs.snippet: Efforts are under way to form a centrist-rightist coalition for Argentina's Presidential election next Feb. 23. One aim is to attract labor union members who once followed the deposed President, Juan D. Peron.
docs.lead_paragraph: Efforts are under way to form a centrist-rightist coalition for Argentina's Presidential election next Feb. 23. One aim is to attract labor union members who once followed the deposed President, Juan D. Peron.
docs.abstract: Conservative party pres Solano Lima repts efforts to form Centrist-Rightist coalition to attract ex-Peronists for Feb election, NYC int; denies Peron has or will be consulted; describes expected lineup

headline.main: ARGENTINES PLAN NEW PARTY GROUP; Centrist-Rightist Coalition Will Direct an Appeal to Former Peronist Labor

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Oct. 24--Heads of governments in many parts of the world joined today in felicitating the United Nations on the twelfth anniversary of its charter.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Oct. 24--Heads of governments in many parts of the world joined today in felicitating the United Nations on the twelfth anniversary of its charter.
docs.abstract: Day marked, UN, elsewhere; Tito, Gen Chiang Kai-shek, Premier Hansen, Sec Gen Hammarskjold messages; statements by Pravda, Sen Knowland

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Oct. 28--The Soviet Union proposed today that closed five-power talks on disarmament be scrapped in favor of a public discussion by the United Nations' full membership of eighty-two states. The closed talks have been going on...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Oct. 28--The Soviet Union proposed today that closed five-power talks on disarmament be scrapped in favor of a public discussion by the United Nations' full membership of eighty-two states. The closed talks have been going on for four years.
docs.abstract: USSR proposes abolishing Comm and subcom and creating new comm of all UN members
